mapper.sql: id, work_name, liable_person, supervisor, job_require, metting_type_id, work_company, finish_time, work_label, work_status, work_level, input_company, supervisor_strategy, enclosure, merge_id, work_progress, work_publish_person
mapper.select:
select dw.* from dl_work_type dwt left join dl_work_type_relation dwtr on dwt.id=dwtr.work_type_id left join dl_work dw on dwtr.work_id=dw.id
1=1 and dwt.id=#{workTypeId}
select dw.* from dl_work dw left join dl_detail_work ddw on dw.id=ddw.work_id left join dl_detail_list ddl on ddw.detail_list_id=ddl.id WHERE 1=1 and ddl.id=#{detailListId}
select dw.* from dl_work dw where 1=1 and dw.liable_person=#{userId} or dw.supervisor=#{userId}
